docs.packages: The `packages` flake output contains packages that can be added to a shell using `nix shell`.

default.shortDescription: An ebook reader application supporting PDF, DjVu, EPUB, FB2 and many more formats, running on Cervantes, Kindle, Kobo, PocketBook and Android devices
